remarks: The value of the Cantor normal form function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-May-2015.)  (Revised by AV, 28-Jun-2019.)
statement:
cantnffval.s $e |- S = { g e. ( A ^m B ) | g finSupp (/) } $.
cantnffval.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. On ) $.
cantnffval.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. On ) $.
cantnffval $p |- ( ph -> ( A CNF B ) = ( f e. S |-> [_ OrdIso ( _E , ( f supp (/) ) ) / h ]_ ( seqom ( ( k e. _V , z e. _V |-> ( ( ( A ^o ( h ` k ) ) .o ( f ` ( h ` k ) ) ) +o z ) ) , (/) ) ` dom h ) ) ) $.
$d A f g h k z $.
$d B f g h k z $.
$d S f $.
